response.overview: (28 Feb 1944) The decision to attack the monastery, occupied and fortified by the Germans, was a military necessity. The results of the decision are vividly portrayed in the following sensational pictures.
response.tagline: (28 Feb 1944) The decision to attack the monastery, occupied and fortified by the Germans, was a military necessity. The results of the decision are vividly portrayed in the following sensational pictures.
response.title: MONTE CASSINO - THE BOMBING
